divs: Sighting DetailsIt was about 11:40 p.m. when I head a dog bark, so I turned and saw a white light or smudge-like white aura in the sky to the west. It then dimmed within about 3 seconds before the light went away completely and the sky seemed normal again. It all seemed like a hallucination. Maybe it was.
Summary: White, dimming aura UFU. It may have been my imagination.
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Northville
There were no other sightings in Northville on or around July 29th 2013
